Pool

class Modules.classPool.Pool(name, dateinamen_tex)[source]

Bases: object

Represents each pool with its corresponding problems.

Construction:

>>> Pool(name, dateinamen_tex)
Parameters

  • name (str) – Name of the pool for example: A1, CV21, DV07

  • dateinamen_tex – All Problem-Solution-file names

ablegen()[source]

Discards all pulled problems to the discard pile

ziehen()[source]

Pulls a random problem + solution from the pool

Returns

aufg_loes

Return type

list[]

TestTyp

class Modules.classTestTyp.TestTyp(name, *pools)[source]

Bases: object

Represents all different test types

Construction:

>>> TestTyp(name, *pools)
Parameters

  • name (str) – Name of the test type, for example the name of Experiment

  • pools (list[pool]) – Pools belonging to the test type, mind the “*”

baue_sumo

Modules.func_baue_sumo.baue_sumo(test_verzeichnis, sumo_name, pdf_liste, seiten_pro_blatt, kopien_pro_datei)[source]

This function creates the sumo file which contains all problems/ solutions for all groups.

Parameters

  • test_verzeichnis (str) – Directory in which the created tests are saved

  • sumo_name (str) – Name of the Sumo file either for the problems or solutions

  • pdf_liste (list[str]) – List of the names of the created PDF problem/ solution files

  • seiten_pro_blatt (int) – How many different pages there should be displayed on one page/ sheet

  • kopien_pro_blatt (int) – How many copies you would like for each problem/ solution

Creates:

  • pdf file sumo_name.pdf

generiere_tex_dateien

Modules.func_generiere_tex_dateien.generieren_tex_dateien(latex_verzeichnis, template_verzeichnis, anzahl_gruppen, test_liste_variante, name_variante, titel_praktikum, semester, test_saetze_pro_gruppe, pool_dateien)[source]

This function replaces the variables within the tex problem/ solution files with the information given by the setting and returns the names of the according pdf files.

Parameters

  • latex_verzeichnis (str) – Directory for the latex compiler

  • template_verzeichnis (int) – Directory of the problem/ solution templates

  • anzahl_gruppe (int) – Number of group pairs

  • test_liste_variante (list[testtyp]) – List of test variants belonging to chosen variant

  • name_variante (str) – Name of the test variant

  • titel_praktikum (str) – Title of the event. Dependent on name_variant

  • semester (str) – Given semester in json settings file

  • test_saetze_pro_gruppe (list[str]) – List of problems/ solutions for each group

  • pool_dateien (list[tuple]) – [0] list of names of problems for each pool, [1] name of pool

Returns

[0] problem pdf names, [1] solution pdf names

Return type

list[tuple]

kombination_aufgaben

Modules.func_kombination_aufgaben.kombination_aufgaben(anzahl_gruppen, test_liste_variante)[source]

For each group this function adds to a list which contains problems and their according solutions from given pools depending on the test variant.

Parameters

  • anzahl_gruppe (int) – Number of group pairs

  • test_liste_variante (list[testtyp]) – List of test variants belonging to chosen variant

Returns

test_saetze_pro_gruppe - problems/ solutions for each group

Return type

list[str]

kompilieren

Modules.func_kompilieren.kompilieren(test_verzeichnis, latex_verzeichnis, generiere_einzel_pdfs, temp_dateien_loeschen)[source]

This function compiles the tex files and turns them into pdf format and moves them to the test directory. Lastly, it deletes temporary data.

Parameters

  • test_verzeichnis (str) – Directory where the generated tests are saved

  • latex_verzeichnis (str) – Working directory of latex compiler

  • generiere_einzel_pdf (bool) – Should individual PDFs be created

  • temp_dateien_loeschen (bool) – Should temporary data be deleted

make_specific

Modules.make_specific.make_specific(make_all, pool, aufgabe)[source]

This Function creates previews for given pools/ problems or all.

Parameters

  • make_all (bool) – Make a preview for all problems

  • pool (str) – Name of the pool to be created

Aufgabe

File name of the problem to be created
